content: on larger raglan row d ws *p to marker sm k1 p4 k1 sm needles dpns or magic loop repeat from * three more times p to end of row pick up and knit 4 6 6 6 6 sts from the cast on edge repeat raglan row a-d 3 3 4 4 5 more times then under the arm then join in the round with the raglan row a-b 1 1 0 1 1 time remaining sleeve sts place a bor marker at the middle of the underarm sts 30 32 36 38 42 sts when increasing is finished there should be 138 142 158 174 190 sts 16 17 19 22 24 sts for each front k all sts in the round until sleeve measures 1 2 3 3 4 22 22 26 28 32 sts for each sleeve and 38 40 44 from the underarm 50 54 sts for the back as well as six sts for each of the decreasing round k1 k2tog k until last 3 sts of round four cable bands along the raglan seams ssk k1 2sts decreased continue working yoke in established pattern knitting k 5 rounds on rs purling on ws maintaining the set cable panels and twisting the cable stitches every 4th row without repeat last six rounds 2 2 2 3 4 more times and then any further increasing for another 2 4 6 6 6 row decreasing round 0 1 1 1 0 times 24 24 28 28 32 sts in the next step decrease stitches are worked over two stitches on either side of a marker the marker will have continue knitting around until sleeve measures 4 5 5 5 to be removed ahead of time 6 5 8 10 5 from underarm take in cable panels *k to 1 st before marker undo & switch to smaller needles remove marker ssk k4 undo & remove marker k2tog cuff k2 p2 around for 1 5 repeat from * three more times k to end of row 8sts decreased bind off loosely in rib p one row repeat for the second sleeve divide for sleeves k 18 19 21 24 26 put next 26 26 right button band 30 32 36 sts on stitch holders or scrap yarn cast on 4 6 6 6 6 sts using backwards loop k 42 44 48 54 58 using smaller needles with rs facing and starting at sts put next 26 26 30 32 36 sts on stitch holders or bottom edge pick up and knit along the right front scrap yarn cast on 4 6 6 6 6 sts using backwards edge pick up about 3 sts for every 4 row in the body loop k 18 19 21 24 26 sts to end of row 86 94 102 making sure to finish with an even number of sts 114 122 sts on the needles starting with p2 work 2x2 ribbing to the end of row body match stitches knit
